short_summary: "Provision of Multi-Disciplinary Engineering Services for various projects in Alberta and British Columbia Mountain National Parks"
description: {"English": "Request for Standing Offer for the Provision of Multi-Disciplinary Engineering Services for various projects in Alberta and British Columbia Mountain National Parks"
full_summary:
**Title (English and French)**: Multi-Disciplinary Engineering Services – Alberta and British Columbia Mountain National Parks
**Reference Number**: cb-7193-24671819
**Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

**Overview**:
The Parks Canada Agency invites consulting firms with engineering expertise to submit proposals for standing offers to provide multidisciplinary engineering services for various projects in the Alberta and British Columbia Mountain National Parks.

**Scope of Work**:
The scope of work includes civil, structural, heritage, building sciences, electrical, mechanical, geotechnical, and multidisciplinary engineering services for a wide variety of assets and sites often located in remote communities.

**Requirements**:
Offerors must submit a separate and complete proposal for each discipline stream. Joint ventures and subcontractors are permitted.

**Important Notes**:

* Requests for clarification or questions must be submitted in writing to Rebecca Chen at rebecca.chen@pc.gc.ca.
* Bids sent via SAP Ariba will not be accepted; only bids submitted via email or fax will be considered.
* Bidders must submit their bid documents as email attachments, not as links.

**Information**:

* National Parks Regulations require all work to be performed in accordance with the National Park Act.
* Bidders must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service to ensure accuracy.
* Parks Canada retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Language and Language Waivers**:
Documents may be submitted in either official language (English or French). However, discrepancies between the English and French documents must be notified to the Contracting Authority.

**Regions of Service**:
The services will be performed in British Columbia and Alberta, Canada.

**Contact Information**:

* Contracting Authority: Rebecca Chen
* Email: rebecca.chen@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: (587) 439-3529

**Attachments**:
Please click on the following links to access the tender documents: (List of links to the tender documents)

Note: I have removed unnecessary information and rewriting the text to make it more professional and concise. I have also added some formatting to make the text easier to read. Let me know if you need any further assistance!
